name: I CAN'T BELIEVE MY HOME IS BEING ATTACKED BY TENTACLE ALIENS FROM ANOTHER DIMENSION - EPISODE 1: Prologue
name_original: I CAN'T BELIEVE MY HOME IS BEING ATTACKED BY TENTACLE ALIENS FROM ANOTHER DIMENSION - EPISODE 1: Prologue
description:
Do you like Magical Girls? Do you hate Tentacle Aliens?

Defend your home! Protect our world!

"I CAN'T BELIEVE MY HOME IS BEING ATTACKED BY TENTACLE ALIENS FROM ANOTHER DIMENSION - EPISODE 1: Prologue" is our team's submission for #GGJ2019. Inspired by mahou shoujo anime and classic shooters like Doom and Wolfenstein, we aimed to create a light-hearted arcade-style game that makes the player feel empowered.

Please enjoy!!

~Team PENTACLES~
Keiji Iino - Artist
Vince Aviles - Artist
Jonas Manuel - Artist
Team Theta Games - Programming

v1.4 Update: Now with spread-shot Alt-Attack!  + various quality of life improvements
